issue.title: [Python][Packaging] Remove boost from the macos wheels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7937](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7937). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Only boost_regex is required for libarrow but only on gcc < 4.9, see

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/f609298f8f00783a6704608ca8493227a552abab/cpp/src/parquet/metadata.cc#L38

so we can remove the bundled boost libraries from the macos wheels as well.
